data.eml:eml: A new species of Hydara (Hemiptera: Coreidae: Coreinae: Hydarini) from Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brailovsky, Harry (2006): A new species of Hydara (Hemiptera: Coreidae: Coreinae: Hydarini) from Madagascar. Zootaxa 1351: 15-22, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174529
